comments.comment: The background, colors, lights and makeup. God I feel sick
අයියෝ අපායට ගියා වගේ මොනවද මේ පාට? පසුතලය නිර්මාණය කලේ යම රජ්ජුරුවොද? මේ වගේ ෂෝ හොඳයි ඔලුව කැක්කුම හදාගන්න. නයිට් ක්ලබ් තීම් එකයි මාර දූතියොයි තමයි මට නම් පේන්නෙ.
Seriously disgusting to see lot of makeup,,expect nadeesha and sachini ayendra all actress looks like crap

Probably these costumes and make up are done by a montessory fancy dress designer ! Except Samanalee, Udari and Paboda all others are looking weired. So ugly. Couldn't digest the outfits, hair styles and the make up. Yashoda looking so aged Pooja 'kunu lobaya' someone definitely might have sponcered her outfit, make up and transport. Only actress in the whole world walks with a camera phone to capture each n everything that she does and post on social media to show the world that she still exits. Lol Roshan's wife. Old fashioned as usual All others not worth even to comment. RIP Lankan fashion industry
Other than pooja,gamya,samanali,nayanathara Nd Shalini others looks absolutely hilarious
මෙහෙමත් ෆොටෝෂොප් යායක්.....ශලනි විතරයි යාන්තම්වත් බේරිලා තියෙන්නේ.
ෆොටෝ බල බල ඉන්නකොට අම්මා ආවා. අම්මාත් ටිකක් වෙලා බලාගෙන ඉඳලා "පුතේ, නිදියන්න ඉස්සෙල්ලා ඔරසං කියලා නිදාගන්න" කියාගෙන ගියා. ඇයි දන්නේ නැහැ අම්මා එහෙම කිව්වේ කවදාවත් නැතුව.....
Only few looks fab others are like zombies as usual,piumi,nadeesha,vinu,maheshi,Sachin ayendra,nilanthi,vidushi omgggg horrible

1) amarasiri kalasuriya + sujatha atthanayka arunama anith okkoma wal badu, pisu yakku, malaperethayo, gobbayo, samanallu, gal moosalayo, kuddo, weda beri tarzan la, anunta wala kapana evun, pissu malahooonthu, ketha evun, magul kadana evun, wal kame yana evun  2) okkoma photos kavuda mee harakek photoshop karala, okkoma moonu walata acid gahala wage, kavuda mee moonawal photoshop karapu ela haraka?  3) ehata kee denna (amarasiri + sujatha) arunama, anith evun evunge weda average. supiri kiyanna behe. amarasiri lage kaalen passe arrpu roshan ranawage acting hondai da? lol sujatha ge kaalen passe arrpu samith/kavi ge singing hondaida? lol  4) mevva balanawata wadaa hondai wana gatha wenawa
